alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 13 at 11:21AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is possible. * WHERE...The Yukon River at Circle * WHEN...Through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Ice jam flooding is possible along the Yukon River at Circle. Impacts could range between minor or severe flooding. Large chunks of ice may push overbank. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Ice jams have been forming and releasing on the Yukon River upstream of Circle. These ice jams have caused a range of flooding from major to minor impacts at some locations along the Yukon River. The first surge of water from one of these ice jams is expected to arrive in Circle this evening or early Sunday morning. A second surge from a large ice jam that was in place upstream of Eagle is expected to arrive late Sunday night or Monday morning. - Http://weather.gov/aprfc - If you live near or along the Yukon River at Circle stay alert and be prepared to take action.
info.instruction: Residents are encouraged to monitor local river conditions and prepare for the possibility of ice jam flooding. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop. Now is the time to move items to higher ground.
